name: CPPointOfInterest
desc: An object that describes a point of interest on the template’s map and in its scrollable picker.

items.name: init(location: MKMapItem, title: String, subtitle: String?, summary: String?, detailTitle: String?, detailSubtitle: String?, detailSummary: String?, pinImage: UIImage?)
items.desc: Creates a point of interest for a specific location.

items.name: var location: MKMapItem
items.desc: The map item that contains the point of interest’s geographical information.

items.name: var pinImage: UIImage?
items.desc: A custom image that the map annotation displays.

items.name: var title: String
items.desc: The title that the picker’s item displays.

items.name: var subtitle: String?
items.desc: The subtitle that the picker’s item displays.

items.name: var summary: String?
items.desc: The summary that the picker’s item displays.

items.name: var primaryButton: CPTextButton?
items.desc: The detail card’s primary action button.

items.name: var secondaryButton: CPTextButton?
items.desc: The detail card’s secondary action button.

items.name: var userInfo: Any?
items.desc: An opaque value for the point of interest.
